page.title: 13Life Style
page.content:
Most breadwinners in the village commute away from home to work. Also the older children travel long distances to school. After work activities take place mainly in the village.
Television is watched a lot in the evening especially during the winter. In summer gardening is a popular pastime.People often have barbecues in the garden when the weather is good.
A majority of households have at least one pet, the most popular annimals being cats and dogs.
Most people have a car, freezer,and washing machine.About 10% of the population have dishwashers and home computers.
